name: Aggregator 1999
description:
The year is 1999, Al Gore is president and Macintosh systems have never gotten a virus. You have just been employed by a social media group tasked to inform the masses about the Y2K phenomenon.  The goal of the game is to manage your account to engage your followers and satisfy your company. Players will be asked to confirm information, complete daily tasks, and recognize misinformation. Lead your followers to a better understanding of reliable information throughout the game.

Game Dev Team

Programmer: Adam Stropkey

Writers: Frank Wilde, Bobby Buzzeo, Brandon Chamberlain
